mdRecord.dcterms:title: Centennial Celebration of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association, October 24, 1953
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Washington family members in attendance at the centennial celebration of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association. Front row (seated left to right): Mrs. Philip Dawson; Mrs. Owen Lewis; Miss Patty Washington; Miss Anne Madison Washington; Mr. Richard Washington; Miss Patty Willis; Miss Lila Tucker. Back row (standing left to right): Mr. and Mrs. John Augustine Washington; Mrs. Richard Washington; Miss Mary Washington; Mrs. Lawrence Washington.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union -- Anniversaries, etc.
